title: [ARCH] Migrate MCP client layer from mcp-sdk-rs to rmcp
description: Replace src/mcp/mod.rs custom transport/session plumbing with rmcp client primitives; keep ToolOrchestrator fallback interface stable; add parity tests for tools/list and tools/call.

logs.msg: Planning context captured in ai/design/runtime-stack-integration-plan-2026-02.md. Goal is rmcp migration with McpFallback contract preserved for ToolOrchestrator.
Roadmap alignment 2026-02-12: queued immediately after tk-86lk closure as Phase 1 priority from ai/STATUS.md and runtime-stack plan.
Reprioritized 2026-02-12: MCP migration deferred until core agent/API/TUI readiness. MCP not currently used in primary workflows.
